attributes.action: give a belated knighthood to tom weir the late great scottish author and broadcaster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like the late tom weir former author and broadcaster best known in scotland for his tv series weirs way.
tom weir has had a lasting and enduring memory throughout scotland. His works have lived on after his death in 2006 and are now seen as legendary in this small part of the world this sort of honour would let the rest of the world know of him great work.

rejection.details: There is no provision in the Statutes of the various Orders of Chivalry for a posthumous Knighthood. Posthumous honours are restricted to medals awarded for bravery only.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
